languages.text: "Можешь не сомневаться, что это неправда. Она еще прочитает тебе тысячу проповедей и нотаций о твоем скверном поведении перед тем, как соблаговолит улететь".
"I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."
languages.original_text: "Можешь не сомневаться, что это неправда. Она еще прочитает тебе тысячу проповедей и нотаций о твоем скверном поведении перед тем, как соблаговолит улететь".

traits.locale_text: "I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."
"I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."
"I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."
"I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."

languages.text: 「安心しろ、実際はそうはならんさ。インセンディアは千の説教を見せてくれるぞ。お前のふざけた振る舞いを叱責して、お暇してくれるのはそこからだな」
languages.original_text: "I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."

traits.locale_text: 「安心しろ、実際はそうはならんさ。インセンディアは千の説教を見せてくれるぞ。お前のふざけた振る舞いを叱責して、お暇してくれるのはそこからだな」

languages.text: “我可以向你保证，她才不会走呢。她会留下来，给你上一千堂课，谴责你的异端行为，之后才会心满意足地屈尊告辞。”
languages.original_text: "I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."

traits.locale_text: “我可以向你保证，她才不会走呢。她会留下来，给你上一千堂课，谴责你的异端行为，之后才会心满意足地屈尊告辞。”

languages.text: «Le aseguro que eso no es cierto. Primero le dedicará un millar de sermones, reprochándole la falta de rectitud en su conducta, y solo entonces se dignará a marcharse».
languages.original_text: "I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."

traits.locale_text: «Le aseguro que eso no es cierto. Primero le dedicará un millar de sermones, reprochándole la falta de rectitud en su conducta, y solo entonces se dignará a marcharse».

languages.text: « Et je peux vous assurer que c'est totalement faux. Elle ne daignera partir qu'après vous avoir débité un millier de sermons et vous avoir {mf|réprimandé|réprimandée} pour l'indécence de votre conduite. »
languages.original_text: "I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."

traits.locale_text: « Et je peux vous assurer que c'est totalement faux. Elle ne daignera partir qu'après vous avoir débité un millier de sermons et vous avoir {mf|réprimandé|réprimandée} pour l'indécence de votre conduite. »

languages.text: "Seid lieber versichert, dass das nicht stimmt. Sie wird Euch tausend Predigten halten und Euer böses Verhalten tadeln, und erst dann wird sie geruhen, abzureisen."
languages.original_text: "I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."

traits.locale_text: "Seid lieber versichert, dass das nicht stimmt. Sie wird Euch tausend Predigten halten und Euer böses Verhalten tadeln, und erst dann wird sie geruhen, abzureisen."

languages.text: "Blöf yapıyor, kanma laflarına. Binlerce vaaz dinletecek, kötü davranışlarından dolayı seni azarlayacak da ancak o vakit ayrılmaya tenezzül edecek."
languages.original_text: "I can assure you that this is false. She will unleash upon you a thousand sermons, reprimanding you for your wicked conduct, and only then will she deign to take her leave."

traits.locale_text: "Blöf yapıyor, kanma laflarına. Binlerce vaaz dinletecek, kötü davranışlarından dolayı seni azarlayacak da ancak o vakit ayrılmaya tenezzül edecek."
